title: Green synthesis of polyimide by using an ethanol solvothermal method for aqueous zinc batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15507-15514

Ya Zhao, Chaoqiao Yang, Hexiang Zhong, Lin Li, Jiangliang Hu, Jiaxin Fan
Utilizing green solvents and raw materials, U-PIs with different morphologies and improved performance were successfully prepared through a solvothermal method.
